mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.store_name, r.rate, r.member_nickname, r.content FROM review r LEFT JOIN store s ON r.store_name = s.name WHERE r.store_name = #{store};
SELECT r.id, r.store_name, r.rate, r.member_nickname, r.content FROM review r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_nickname = m.nickname WHERE r.member_nickname = #{member_nickname};
